name: affine
tagline: A self-hosted collaborative workspace for notes, whiteboards, and structured content
description: AFFiNE is a collaborative, privacy-focused workspace that combines note-taking, whiteboarding, and database organization. It offers real-time sync, offline editing, and AI-assisted features, designed to be a self-hosted modern productivity tool.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Changes appear instantly across all your devices. Work seamlessly from anywhere

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Self-host for complete data ownership or use secure cloud hosting. Your data, your choice

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Block-based editing with extensive formatting and multimedia support. Create beautiful, structured content

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Desktop applications optimized for Linux, Windows, and macOS. Superior performance on every platform
